title: Curried Winter Soup
ingredients: ['1 small spaghetti marrow (squash), halved', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves crushed garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2L (3 1/4) pints vegetable stock', '50g (2 oz) lentils', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '50g (2 oz) uncooked rice', '175g (6 oz) frozen sweetcorn', 'handful macaroni, or any other small pasta shape']
